description: This source file implements the 'Http Simple Proxy Object' interface functions, specifically 'HttpSpoCbcReplyHeaders' and 'HttpSpoCbcReplyBody', which control the proxy's behavior in response handling. It appears to be part of an HTTP proxy component within a larger system, providing stub functions that currently return a relay process mode.

methods.name: ULONG HttpSpoCbcReplyHeaders(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSession,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage)
methods.description: Controls proxy response headers behavior; currently stub returning relay mode.

methods.name: ULONG HttpSpoCbcReplyBody(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSession,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage)
methods.description: Controls proxy response body behavior; currently stub returning relay mode.
